tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_donor_orgs CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_donor_orgs AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, org.name AS org_name, f.amp_donor_org_id AS org_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_organisation org ON org.amp_org_id = f.amp_donor_org_id WHERE (f.source_role_id = (SELECT amp_role.amp_role_id FROM amp_role WHERE amp_role.role_code = 'DN')) OR (f.amp_funding_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT(amp_funding_id) FROM amp_funding_detail det WHERE det.adjustment_type IN (SELECT id from amp_category_value WHERE amp_category_class_id=(SELECT id FROM amp_category_class WHERE keyname='SSC_adjustment_type'))));
